tagline: PvPTitles - Earn Titles for Player kills
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### Welcome to PvPTitles
[PvPTitles](http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/pvp-titles/ "PvPTitles") is based on the Hero titles from [Guild Wars](http://www.guildwars.com/ "Guild Wars") and takes the idea of PvP Titles. These Titles reflect a player's success in defeating other players by earning Titles after a specific amount of Kills.

### Features
* Get new Titles on Player kills
* Set your own Titles and their Fame amount
* One simple command for all your desires /rank 

### Commands
* /rank - Displays your info
* /ladder - Shows top 5 players with fame

### Useful Links
[Configuration](http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/pvp-titles/pages/main/config/ "Configuration")

### Authors and Contributors
Former Author @dreanor created this plugin. If you have any problems feel free to tweet to the original created [ASC_Dreanor](https://twitter.com/ASC_Dreanor "ASC_Dreanor")

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with anything about this plugin? Please go to [PvPTitles](http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/pvp-titles/ "PvPTitles") and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.

### Disclaimer
PvPTitles will change it's Author for further development. This page wont be updated anymore and is just a piece of Information of the original plugin.
name: Pvptitles
